message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer but $120 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $85 for the product. What do you think?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm afraid $85 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $105.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $105 is still outside my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $95.  Let's try to make this work.
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to make this work, but $95 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but that's as low as I can go.
